website_summaries.verdict: It may not sound quite good as some $200 competitors, but the JBL Pulse's integrated light show adds a flashy new dimension to the listening experience that makes it a worthy contender in a crowded market.
pros: The JBL Pulse is a compact wireless Bluetooth speaker that delivers good sound for its size and distinguishes itself with an integrated light show with preprogrammed and customizable themes
The built-in rechargeable battery offers 10 hours of battery for sound only and 5 hours with the light show in effect
cons: Can distort at higher volumes with rock tracks and bass-heavy material

customer_reviews.title: This little speaker packs some punch!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker packs a punch, and gives you a light show. JBL definitely fit their quality sound into a small package with this bluetooth speaker. We were at an event and we noticed the music was coming from one of these, and that's why we purchased this one. Update*one year later this is still my favorite little speaker we use it constantly outdoors by the firepit, inside while I’m working, in the bathroom playing relaxing music for a bath. It’s the best. You can use a an alternate micro usb charger like you would use to charge a Samsung phone plugged into a laptop to charge if your cord wears out or gets lost. Just FYI!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this speaker. It gets pretty loud. The bass isn't as strong as I had hoped. Also, the battery life is pretty short when the lights are on, especially at the brightest setting. So unfortunately I use this speaker without all the cool lights to maximize my battery life, which sort of defeats the purpose of getting this speaker. The price-point is also way too high. They have same quality speakers for way less of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina G

customer_reviews.title: Buy this speaker. You can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I have a JBL Clip speaker and it has the best sound of any speaker I’ve owned, ever. So I bought this one for the LED light show and for a bigger overall speaker. It was smaller than I expected but still everything I wanted and more. I’d estimate that it’s 3 or 4 times louder than the clip. The lights are beautiful! There are so many different ways to program them. If I had to criticize anything it would be that I can’t charge it in the horizontal position.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget BT Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can not beat it! Mid range and high end could be a little better. But for the price, it will do. Battery life is great so far. I like the idea that it powers off when not in use. The voice prompt is a great feature too. I bought this speaker because of all the positive reviews. If you are on a budget, this is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: w

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge anymore after having it a year. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a weekly basis while working. Loved the lights, loved the sound, however; we bought this January 23, 2016, now a year and a couple of months later, it doesn't charge. First, last week, it wouldn't hold a charge, now, today, it won't charge at all. While plugged into either the computer or the wall charger, it just blinks red. Wish it would've lasted longer than this for the price. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TandT

customer_reviews.title: 👍Excellent Device! 🎵
customer_reviews.text: Still have to keep testing this little thing... But, for now, I can say that this wireless bluetooth speak is excellent. I mean it looks great, it feels very solid, the audio is excellent I mean truly awesome if you ask me. I really like the black with orange color and it still would've been the one I choose, but it would've been great to have other color options to choose from like blue, green or red. It has a combination of 3 speakers, two on front and one subwoofer on the back. It sound awesome, I really can't complain and I wish I don't have to. Great buy!!! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Varo

customer_reviews.title: MUCH SPEAKER, VERY SOUND
customer_reviews.text: I use this on a daily basis in the shower and it's fantastic! I almost never have to charge this thing, waterproof rating is phenomenal, volume is excellent, and bass sounds amazing. The last speaker I had of this quality was a 100 plus dollar Bose and it wasn't even waterproof. This thing is an excellent deal and I'm glad I bought it. I wouldn't be too worried about humidity either, the first 5-10min I shower it's a sauna in there and it's had zero problems. I've had it a couple of months so far and it was a good find!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip J. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, good battery life and good sound.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pleasant surprise for me, as I have yet to find a speaker that is loud enough for me to hear over work noise. The bass is a little lacking, but the sound quality is a definite 7 or better out of 10 for a bluetooth portable speaker. The volume lets you hear your music clearly above 70db background noises, as well as battery life to last you a full shift. The 320 degree of the cone allows you to hear the speaker from almost any direction for 30+ yards away. Well done JBL.
customer_reviews.author: davoz28caboose

customer_reviews.title: I like it !
customer_reviews.text: I like it ! My wife was wishing she had some external speakers for her smart phone on the outside patio so I looked for weather proof speakers that might be occasionally left out in the rain. This product is sturdy and a bit smaller than I expected based on the picture... but that is okay.. they sound great. The sync process via Blue Tooth was pretty easy. The unit worked when it arrived but needed charging. We just plugged in the charge cable and listened while it was charging. Great !
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: He was happy with that
customer_reviews.text: The first thing my husband said about this speaker is ITS LOUD! He was happy with that. We normally spend $20 on speakers so the ones we own aren't as powerful. Its pretty heavy as well so it seems built well. My husband isnt the best at electronics of any type so he had issues with the pairing of our other speakers but not this one. I like the talking feature because it tells you what it is doing. I'm very happy with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless speaker - Quality sound for a good price
customer_reviews.text: My sister had one of these when I visited last summer so I knew it would be a great gift for my husband. We all love this bluetooth speaker. The sound quality is excellent for the price. The lights are fun and you can turn that feature off if you wish. I highly recommend the JBL Pulse Wireless Bluetooth Speaker with LED lights. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Moonbeam95

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!! Only one flaw in my personal opinion
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying I am blowm away by the quality of this speaker. I work in Industrial Manufacturing, and when I can't use my headphones I have yet to be running a machine that I cannot hear my music over. Sound quality is great, no distortion maxed out and I jam metal at work. It is not light, something I love, shows quality and strength to me. My one complaint is the buttons, not a fan of dual purpose buttons but for what it does it is top shelf. Already have a few guys at work wanting one and it is my first day using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: I can tell you that I've made a really good choice. After reading some bad reviews on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a second wireless bluetooth speaker after having a Bose Mini SoundLink. I can tell you that I've made a really good choice. After reading some bad reviews on the Pulse 2, I chose to go for the first model. Everything is perfect, easy to use and great sound. If you are looking for something a little bit different than a basic bluetooth speaker, go for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas SEVEL

customer_reviews.title: Got it for $50 and it sounds great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got it for $50 and it sounds great for the price. Nice clean bass and doesn't distort with high volume. However, when using blu tooth is would be occasionally spotty, even with iPhone 5 within a few feet of the speaker. I attribute the reception issue to my old phone, but since I don't know anything about blu tooth and how to potentially fix the spotty reception I decided to return the speaker. I haven't gotten anything to replace it yet. Perhaps with a different phone it would work better, but like I said, I didn't have the time or inclination to trouble shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Ender21

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great item at a great price. The only issue I had, and it is a very small one, is that I bought this as a gift and the packaging it comes in is very cheap looking- it looks like packaging for a knockoff item you'd get in a Chinatown shop, which does injustice to the quality of the product inside. The speaker itself sounds great. I have a Bose radio and, although I'm admittedly not an audiophile, I would say this speaker sounds just as good as my Bose at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: but good quality. It took me awhile to notice the ...
customer_reviews.text: Has held up well in my shower. Loud enough to be heard clearly. No sonic miracles, but good quality. It took me awhile to notice the low battery indicator. At first I didn't think it had one. I get some clipping of the sound when I listen to some podcasts and audiobooks. I think it cuts the connection briefly or goes into power savings mode or something when there is absolute silence in the audio, but then it takes a moment to start going again and the first half of a lot of words get cut off.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, but only pairs with Android devices
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers! Really nice sound quality, that fills the room rather than playing music at you. These speakers play Drum and Bass really well, and carry the sound really far and clear. Really tough device, I have dropped in many times! Cons: only pairs with android devices. is only water proof when auxiliary cord is covered. I wish it had a SD card option Everytime the device turns on or off it notifys you really loud "powering off/on" AND when the volume is at maximum, infact it skips the music for an awkwardly long time to notify you that it is at maximum or minimum volume (at a really loud volume) I would highly recommend this product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Well I have used it for sometime and I have not done the water test however it is loud for its size I use it about a couple days at mor than half volume about three hours, it pairs quickly out if box but takes abit more after use probably the two phones I switch between. It is heavy but tough, military grade if I can say so. Under three hours to charge, if it is soft it's because the input signal is low. Using the m to m audio give it a bit more on the volume. Value for 50 for the specified features. Could have not features but the price would definitely change.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and soothing to watch
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is beautiful while the music is playing. It has a lot of color patterns and functions that you can choose from. I have had four other JBL speakers which are great products, but this particular one has less bass than all the others I have had but it still sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: High quality at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: I truly can only say good things about this product, it does what it says it does in the description. It's heavy duty quality sound and much more. I'm disabled and I take it with me in the shower and can answer the phone while I'm in there without having to worry about getting to the phone I really appreciate that. This rating is not exaggerated I would certainly buy it again and really is a high-end product at a decent price. I liked it so much I bought one for a dear friend for her birthday. If you're looking for a quality Bluetooth system this is it buy it! William Stone
customer_reviews.author: william stone

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom for Mother's day, and she loves it! She goes camping alot, and mentioned last year that she would love a wireless speaker so when I randomly found this I figured I'd give it a shot. She said it was easy to connect to her Galaxy S4 (she hasn't joined the rest of the world in upgrading yet lol!), she tried it out as soon as she got it. She went camping this past weekend and texted me thanking me again for it. Thinking about getting one for myself now :)
customer_reviews.author: MummaMel

customer_reviews.title: Does not float. Definitely waterproof. Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great! I also own a $300 Bose portable speaker and this one sounds almost as good. I went to test it in the pool before I hit the river. It's a good thing that I did, because I dropped it in the water and it sank straight to the bottom. I almost had a heart attack. I thought that I just fried my new speaker. I fished it out and as soon as it broke the surface of the water it connected to my phone and started playing again. I don't know if I did something wrong but it definitely does not float. It works fine after ten minutes under four feet of water.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dodson

customer_reviews.title: I am comfortable with it by the pool
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. I am comfortable with it by the pool. It works when it gets splashed. I do not like that when I put it in the pool (or it falls in) that the sound completely shuts off. Kind of disappointed. I kept it because when it is dry the sound is great and the Bluetooth works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Falls short after week of steady use
customer_reviews.text: At first I was in love with this speaker. Sound was great and filling. But after a week of use at about 1/4 volume the sound has become nonexistent to say the least. What I used to be able to hear at 1/4 volume now can barely even be heard at 1/2 volume. Seems I have to turn the volume all the way up just to get any sound so I can hear it. Not happy with the quality of this product. Looks like I will be saving up to get a $200-400 portable speaker for quality.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker to use outdoor next to our pool. I have three kids who love to splash and make a mess and this speaker has definitely lived up to its promise. Very tough and durable, and withstands plenty of splashing. It was very easy to pair with any of our phones and has great sound quality. I have not yet had it on long enough to test the actual battery life but so far so good. I would definitely recommend this to a friend or family member and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice speaker and hold up well
customer_reviews.text: Really nice speaker. I haven't tested out the full extent of its waterproof rating yet, but it's a very nice sounding speaker and the battery lasts a long while. Ordered a second one in a different color for my dad for Father's Day and he loves it too. It's even held up for the past few months in his work environment, which is constant dust and sand in the air at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Casual Cult

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Just received the speaker today and tested it out. It was a bit smaller than I was anticipating, but is very solidly built. Pairing with my Bluetooth device was super simple and within minutes of taking it out of the package, I was listening to music. Even with it's small size, the sound quality is excellent. It won't blast out the neighbors, but will fill a portion of the back yard with great sounding music.
customer_reviews.author: S. Buettner

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed for outdoor gatherings
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as loud as I was looking for, as I wanted something that could be heard over ATV and tractor engines. As a solution for poolside or volleyball court-side with a group of friends, though, its volume range is perfect. Pairs easily, charges quickly, and I love the tripod mount capability.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and works well!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and gets almost too loud in close range listening if you turn it all the way up. I've taken it out on the lake stand up paddle boarding and it was audible to my paddling party within about 40 feet with ambient noise. The sound intensity is directional so try out different placements for optimal listening!
customer_reviews.author: John Szysh

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for my husband for Father's Day. Although it was a bit smaller than I expected (didn't look at the measurements) it produces great sound. He loves it and it's portability, he totes it with him from the patio, to the fire pit, to the home gym. Great value for an exceptional product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Tapke-Moser

customer_reviews.title: Not working after rafting trip
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker for a water rafting trip. It was never submerged in water, but will not work correctly since the trip. The speaker sound like it playing under water and we can't use it anymore. Only used it that one day and it doesn't work anymore. Not worth the money. Wish I could return it now.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Huff

customer_reviews.title: I love this little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker. It has better sound quality than the life jacket mini. I also like that you can disable the voice on it. Within 1 week of getting this, I spilt tea all over it. It is as waterproof as they say. I have yet to have an issue with this product.
customer_reviews.author: cam

customer_reviews.title: Small package big sound.
customer_reviews.text: I own a Braven and figured i would try the IPX7 for vacation beach use. Sound quality in higher than most units 5X the price. Good bass and loud when turned to its highest level. Solid construction and only 2.5 pounds. Only draw back is no power port. I dont think you could get a better unit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: Quality Waterproof Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I listen to music in the shower with these, and they sound just as good as my bose speakers. I've had them almost a year now and they are still in great shape. I love using them by the pool / beach without having to worry about getting them wet. Truly great product for the price, I wish I had 3 more!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Paperweight
customer_reviews.text: Didn't use it all the time, and sounded great while it worked and stopped working all together. Wouldn't hold a charge even connected to power source.
customer_reviews.author: Justin James

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound is absolutely amazing, and it has plenty of color settings to keep you entertained. The set up is easy and quick, it automatically connects to my phone if the Bluetooth is on so you don't have to continuously seek out the connection. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is because I was hoping for a bit longer of a battery life. Other than that I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Its been abused at the beach and the pool and continues to work like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. Its been abused at the beach and the pool and continues to work like a charm. Charges relatively quickly and will last a full day on the charge streaming Pandora from my phone. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: WinstonMagoo

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great sounding speaker
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my son. He was thrilled with it, said it sounded great and loved the durability of it. Apparently so did someone else on campus because it got stolen :( I will definitely get him another for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but battery goes dead quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound from these speakers. The battery does go dead pretty quickly so you will not be able to go boating all day and use these speakers. I have not dropped this in the water yet and I do not intend to so I have no idea if the speaker will still work after being submerged in water like they advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Richard           kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my time with a Pyle driver model PWPBT60 first ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasted my time with a Pyle driver model PWPBT60 first which lasted less than 8 months before it crapped out. this one connects much faster, has better sound quality, less tinny sounding. has good bass, and sturdy. Also really good battery life. I use it in the woodshop, it gets covered in sawdust, and no problems so far. Good in the shower. Had it about 7 or 8 months now, and love it, well worth the extra $20 or so over the Pyle driver POS.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great little speaker, we use it everywhere. it was even the speaker for our small wedding we had. We use it camping, on the boat or outside doing chores, works great from IPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: does NOT float
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound. Not scratchy or annoying. Could be louder. Doesn't have anywhere to attached it to something so it fell off my floatie and drowned. Someone left a review saying it floats.... it does NOT float.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Khatibi

customer_reviews.title: Float the river with your tunes
customer_reviews.text: Works great and it floats so this will be the music source for floating the river. Loud enough and its waterproof so win win
customer_reviews.author: SC803SC

customer_reviews.title: Must have item!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Use it for all our pool parties. Have tested it several times in the water with no problems. Goes through all our phones both Apple and Samsung with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Black Widow

customer_reviews.title: The speaker stopped working after 3 months. I did ...
customer_reviews.text: The speaker stopped working after 3 months. I did not use it very frequently, maybe 2 times a month then one day it just quit playing music. Now no sound comes out of the speaker. It doesn't matter if I use bluetooth or the aux connection, just silence. Never dropped the speaker, never submerged it, yet it just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this speaker. It really is waterproof but the speaker turns off when submerged. The battery life is impressively long when fully charged and charge time is quick. We use this speaker constantly and it goes with us everywhere for outside gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Callen

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Produce
customer_reviews.text: We use this for outdoor parties, it is weatherproof and drop proof. I have since recommended this product. Easy to pair with my phone. I didn't get 10 hours out of it but it seemed to last well past 8 hours. Sound quality is very good, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: NJPhones

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised.
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the sound and battery life. Was pleasantly surprised. The sound rivals my wife's little Bose speaker (not quite as good, but close, and half the price.). Would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Multi use
customer_reviews.text: I use this for phone also. Works great for hard of hearing people
customer_reviews.author: Debra MAC

customer_reviews.title: Good Speaker ! Loud announcements.
customer_reviews.text: I like it , the sound quality is good and it does float. I thought you could listen to it while it was floating but you can't , it shuts off. What I don't like is the announcements when you turn it on " powering on , ready to pair , paired " at full volume. Also "powering off " It's just not necessary !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is amazing. Love the clarity of the volume
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing. Love the clarity of the volume, bright and attractive lights/color. The seller was so helpful and package arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Lady B

customer_reviews.title: Two months in the cold weather.
customer_reviews.text: I love in southeast Alaska. I was putting up Halloween decorations and forgot it outside, I thought Id lost it. My son and I were taking down our xmas decorations and he found it, brought it inside out it by the heater for the night turn it in the next morning works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Benson James

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker works great! Good battery life, louder than any other of the Bluetooth speakers I own. Just watch the shipping when you buy, make sure you look for the prime version or it will be on a slow boat from China.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Received a "Demo" Version that did not turn on
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what I was sent but it would not turn on after charging for hours. I have another older jbl speaker that l love and I'm pretty tech savvy and it did not work....also there was this sticker on it that literally read "DEMO not for resale" so that's pretty sweet. The fact that this could get sent out to a customer who spent s lot of money to have to go through the hassle of returning when it was a gift....pretty crappy.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: This is a great speaker. Just more expensive than it should be ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker. Just more expensive than it should be especially with a newer model out. JBL didn't lower the price. They just made the new one more expensive. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: Skeelo69

customer_reviews.title: ... the product for about 2-3 weeks but I'm extremely satisfied. The speaker has a high end feel with ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only owned the product for about 2-3 weeks but I'm extremely satisfied. The speaker has a high end feel with a smaller price tag. I washed my car with the speaker on top. It still sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: E. P.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product to have in my garage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to have in my garage. It plays clear quality music at the right level to let me concentrate while working on my truck or working out. This is a great product and I would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: I love camping

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Loudest, clearest music at max volume I've heard out of a box this size in a rugged design. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: BangStick

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than expected
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this for a short time, so I can't speak to how long the battery will last, but the sound quality is very good for such a small speaker. It is heavier than I expected, which would be an issue if we were planning to use it while hiking, but we plan to use it to take our music with us on a road trip. Set up/Bluetooth pairing was extremely easy. Overall very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LMT

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the waterproof IPX7 wireless bluetooth speakers to go tubbing down the river, take on bike rides, and pontooning. It worked great when I was at home, but when I was out of my home with it the volume and sound clarity was not good. The volume did not meet my expectations and I think that the one I got was not working right. I am going to buy another one and see if it works. If it doesn't I will return it and look for a different waterproof bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof speaket
customer_reviews.text: Pairs easier than anything we have used. We love how it speaks to you to let you know if it's successful. Sound is very good, probably not top notch high end sound but its very good. We are very pleased easpecially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin S Helton

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: Works great and sounds very good. The only drawback is the rubber coating over the controls which makes them more difficult to operate. On the other hand, It would not be waterproof without that. Great for outdoor use where you might forget to bring it in, or for use around a pool.
customer_reviews.author: George Van Vechten

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my brother and he absolutely loves it! I love using it too, when I get the chance. It's super easy to use and the sound quality is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Luiza Pompeo

customer_reviews.title: ... just about a month now and I am very satisfied with the quality of not only the sound but ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for just about a month now and I am very satisfied with the quality of not only the sound but also of the unit itself. I use it for my Ipod touch and was able to pair it after the unit charged with no problem. We had purchased the same speaker for an eight year old for use with her ipod and was very impressed with the durability of the unit. At this time I have not had any major issue in the design or performance of the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell Taylor

customer_reviews.title: nice usefull speaker - not super powerful -good buy if this is what your looking for-id buy again
customer_reviews.text: i dipped it in water just to check it out and its still working !! overall id say super built with good clarity and nice features ,bluetooth easy to pair ,good run time but not overpowering volume, good for a small get together or just listening in the garage but not gonna make you turn it down cause its to loud
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker. Great for the beach, boat and pool. Battery life has been fantastic and yes it really does float.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schickman

customer_reviews.title: Stellar product, would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Solid, quality build. Bluetooth connection is easy and hasn't dropped on me once (tested at max distance of 20 feet, 40+ hours of use). Surprisingly loud with powerful bass and crisp tone. Very impressed. Only drawback is it's pretty heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Collins

customer_reviews.title: good sound
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this thing. The sound is LOUD and isn't poor quality, i have not tested the waterproof capabilities but in terms of sound it is great.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Poor Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad speaker, but the battery life in it is terrible. Can only listen maybe 3-4 hours tops at very low volume and then it dies without warning. Tried plugging it in to the wall and using it that way, but its nearly impossible to enjoy your music when the speaker is screaming "CHARGING" every 5 seconds. Also even though it's plugged into the outlet it will still die. It lasts maybe 30 minutes on the charger after being totally dead. I haven't tested the water proof claim yet. That's coming this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Sound is much better than what I expected and the lights are bright ...
customer_reviews.text: Clear LOUD sound and "ok" bass . Sound is much better than what I expected and the lights are bright and the feature is easy to use via the free app. Just as good as an $250 Bose speaker with just a little less thump but well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: DC Brother

customer_reviews.title: A really good and powerful little speaker
customer_reviews.text: A really good and powerful little speaker! Sound is nice, not hollow at all. A little heavier than I expected it to be and I wish it had a handle built into it, but a good find nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: abigail warnock

customer_reviews.title: Fathers day gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my Dad. He loves it and after hearing how much louder it is then the one I have , I'm going it to get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Washington

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I take it everywhere and never worry about having to "baby it". Most everyone that hears it, is impressed with the sound quality and volume it puts out. Still not sure how to pronounce the name, but I do know it's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Bert Ware

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it, I renamed it "My Beautiful"
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it, I renamed it "My Beautiful". Super easy to link up through Bluetooth. You can change the patterns with the JBL app. Great sound quality, much better than Bose for old people that is perfect if you can't hear the static-ie sound.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Day

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This was a great entry level speaker. Deffenitly more than i expected
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: GREAT value and incredible sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, incredibly long battery life, lots of features and easy setup. All of this for under $50 - already recommended to two friends who heard it over the weekend at a small party - they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it has a fantastic sound and it portable
customer_reviews.text: I have researched this machine and even though some other speakers rate higher, I decided to give it a try. My 13 year old daughter loves this and I have to admit, it has a fantastic sound and it portable. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beth L. Stone

customer_reviews.title: the ad makes it seems like the speaker will play fine in the water
customer_reviews.text: Speaker sounds a little staticky. Also, the ad makes it seems like the speaker will play fine in the water. Oh, don't get me wrong, it plays, but it sound garbled. I guess it's might fault for reading too much into the ad. Unfortunately, the speaker has stopped working after about 2 weeks. It turns on and plays for a few seconds then it stops, even when plugged directly into a power source. Now I have to see if the manufacturer or Amazon honor the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 1-year
customer_reviews.text: Charging port broke in less than a year. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: 1sttymhmownr

customer_reviews.title: Would recomend-
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Great price. Tied to an inner tube while down the river and it still works like new. The battery life could be longer but that's just me being greedy. Satisfied buy.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is great. Was skeptical about ordering it at first because ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Was skeptical about ordering it at first because I've never heard of this brand but was definitely worth the price. The sound quality is great and very loud. I've already gotten a lot of use out of it and I've only had it for a week. All in all its a great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: JNL Pluse Wireless Bluetooth Speaker is the very first Bluetooth Speaker I have ever bought. I have to say I am very impressed!! The sound quality is great!! Better than expected actually. A single charge lasts a really long time. Love all the different color pattern options.
customer_reviews.author: beckbeck2222

customer_reviews.title: Nice wireless bluetooth speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound; sturdy; well built. However, the sound disappears beyond 30 feet or so and even on shorter distance when my cellphone and the unit is separated between walls. Otherwise, good for office and bedroom use.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLIE  D.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Bluetooth Speaker for my son-in-laws birthday. He brought it to our weeklong beach vacation. Everyone was very inpressed with the quality and sound of this little speaker. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: KButler

customer_reviews.title: NOPE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this device to connect to my tube while i floated the Guadalupe River. Worked excellent for about an hour then after that wouldn't get louder than a whisper when turned all the way up, It never was fully submerged in the river so i feel like it doesn't have an excuse to stop working. Contacted the seller and they basically told me "sorry about your bad luck" go kick rocks. Will never purchase from them again and do not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lance lusk

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was quick and quality is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased a brand new boat. We decide against having a radio installed so I decided to purchase this for Father's Day. We have used it almost every weekend and it has gotten wet from the water splashing with no issues. The radio is loud and very clear! Shipping was quick and quality is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Covington

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great for the size and fantastic battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds fantastic for the size, relatively inexpensive and has been dumped into the pool, lake from a kayak etc. Still sounds great. Battery life is phenomenal as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stableconvergence

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Best Bluetooth speaker I have ever owned. It's very loud and the bass is strong! I am planning on buying a few of these as Christmas gifts. The weight is great as well, especially considering that I have clumsy hands.
customer_reviews.author: MMCrum75

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: First off, this is a great speaker. I originally had a photive speaker but I felt like I needed a new one so after research I came to this one and it's a great product. It feels heavy, but a good heavy. It's a quality product my only concern is with how difficult it is to close the "door" that houses the charging and aux port, you really gotta press hard for that tight seal. Other than that, it's a great speaker
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Portable Bluetooth waterproof speaker .
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I had other portable radio but nothing like this. It's official if you're looking for a Bluetooth waterproof portable speaker this is it. I'm super happy with it. Can't wait to go to the beach with it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Polonia

customer_reviews.title: Nothing on the market currently beats this
customer_reviews.text: For the price, nothing beats it. Huge sound, fully waterproof, and amazing battery life. Took these down the river on a float trip, fell in water constantly with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: SeaBass

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised...in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely outstanding speaker. Use it next to our hot tub and needless to say it's fallen in a few times. Works perfect and is LOUD. Surprising bass performance and battery life is outstanding. Super buy at the price point for the performance you are getting. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: justsomeguy

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my brother when he saw it in a store. I loved it so much, I keep stealing it from him! Sound quality is great and I never get tired of the ever changing colors. I wish the battery life was a bit better on it but nothing to complain about. We do use it alot!
customer_reviews.author: Lilit

customer_reviews.title: great. Seen my co-worker with his
customer_reviews.text: Simply, great. Seen my co-worker with his. Then told myself, I have to have one for me. It's been ideal for BBQ's, pick nicks,camping and just around the house. My wife loves it to. Going to get the water proof one that just came out for her. So, I can have mine back.😀
customer_reviews.author: TGutierrez

customer_reviews.title: When it works it is a decent unit. However ...
customer_reviews.text: When it works it is a decent unit. However, it randomly drops the Bluetooth connection and it doesn't matter if the unit is right next to the source or across the house. No real pattern. It has gotten to the point where I am going to start looking for a different unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great sounding speaker plus all the pulse lights would recomend
customer_reviews.author: Marek

customer_reviews.title: Great product. 4 stars because it is not loud ...
customer_reviews.text: Not too loud but so durable and convenient. Bluetooth and NFC work flawlessly. I can receive calls hands free in my kayak as long as I am near a cell tower. Great product. 4 stars because it is not loud at all.
customer_reviews.author: Raine Tomchek

customer_reviews.title: terrible for outside
customer_reviews.text: terrible for outside, brought to beach and as soon as it got hot the volume went down and you can't turn it back up. my phone was louder then this. bought a different speaker since and love it. hate this one
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Big sound for small speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for such a small speaker. Great service and fast shipping. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the speaker for 5 months before it stopped working. One day it just died and it no longer holds a charge or turns on. I loved it when it worked but with such a short life span im kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rodriguez

product_meta.title: Alphasonik Phantom Wireless Bluetooth V4.2 Portable Party Speaker with Loud 30W HD Stereo Sound and Rich Bass, Built-in Mic, Micro USB, Auxiliary, 4000mAh Battery 24-Hour Playtime for iPhone, Samsung
product_meta.description: Style:BlackThe all new Alphasonik PHANTOM has twice the bass than the CORE speaker. As the most massive speaker in this Bluetooth family, the PHANTOM weights in at 3.7 pounds. It delivers 30W of pure audio power with <1% harmonic distortion through the biggest bass driver Alphasonik has to offer in this line of speakers! The four professionally tuned drivers and the AlphaBass technology deliver very well balanced mids and highs with punching low end and powerful volume. The built in 4000mAh Li-battery provides up to 24 hours of uninterrupted entertainment on a full battery charge. When your PHANTOM is fully charged using the Micro USB provided, the red LED battery indicator will turn off so you may take your PHANTOM anywhere you choose! When unplugged, this amazing speaker also provides you with a battery level indicator that lets you know how much life it has left. Approximate charge time is 3-4 hours depending on battery life. Enjoy music and also hands free calling with the built in microphone. The engineers at Alphasonik carefully designed the capabilities of the PHANTOM so you can play music from Bluetooth (V4.2+EDR) and from an Auxiliary cable from any device with a 3.5mm audio cable. The PHANTOM also offers a 5V/2A USB output port for external device charging! Additionally, you can pair 2 PHANTOM speakers and connect them to a single source and expand the sound range! As if one PHANTOM wasn’t loud enough, 2 of them will get any party started! This powerful speaker will bring you big sound and the ease of set up and use is an additive to the already enjoyable features.
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR SOUND QUALITY WITH RICH FULL BASS - The PHANTOM weights in at 3.7 pounds. It delivers 30W of pure audio power with <1% harmonic distortion through the biggest bass driver Alphasonik has to offer in this line of speakers!

60 FOOT BLUETOOTH RANGE - Play up to 60 feet away from your device; our advanced antenna design with Bluetooth 4.2 provides fast connection and incredible wireless Bluetooth range of up to 60 unobstructed feet from your device

PLAY YOUR MUSIC TO TWO PHANTOM SPEAKERS - Wirelessly connect two PHANTOM speakers together, one speaker plays left the channel and the other plays the right, to Play Your Music From a Single Source for incredible stereo separation
PLAY UP TO 24 HOURS ON A SINGLE CHARGE - Play from morning till night with up to 24 hour playtime With The built in 4000mAh Li-battery, Comes with a Micro USB Charging Cable and a 3.5mm audio cable
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED! - We are confident that you will love your speaker, but if you are not satisfied, our products are always backed by 30 Day 100% Money Back No Question Asked Guaranteed!
